pageContext.claim: “Many, many [auto] plants are now under construction in Michigan and Ohio, Pennsylvania, North Carolina, South Carolina, Florida, they hadn't built one in decades and now they're all over the place.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often claims that car plants are being built in several swing states he would need to win reelection in 2020. Although some automakers have announced new plants or expansions in Michigan, Ohio and South Carolina, there's little or no evidence for the other swing states Trump mentions. It's also not true that plants have not been built in decades.
